message: Živijo!  Zanima me če paše ArcticCooling NV silencer 5 (rev.2) na Geforce 7800GT?

Test: NV Silencer 5 rev.3 na 7800GTX by  cole-22  NV Silencer Compatibility (on Nvidia boards) The NV Silencer 5 is basically compatible to the NVIDIA 7800 series boards except the power plug. You can take the power from the VGA board with connecting the black and red wire or you get the power from the PSU directly. Best is you buy a Y-cable for the 5.25" power cables, cut o­ne plug of it and connect black with black and red (VGA) with yellow (PSU) in order to get 12V. Remove the isolation of the cables and twist them into each other, then isolate it with tape.  To pa piše na njihovi strani

OK ql pol. Ker po slikah sodeč se mi ni zdel rev.2 različen od rev. 3, skrbelo me je samo zaradi ramov(če so enake razdalje). Namreč rev. 2 bom dobil po simbolični ceni, zato ne bom kupoval rev. 3.  LP!

AAAA. Application:  AGP: Geforce 6800 Series FX 4000 PCIe: Geforce 6800 Series Geforce 7800 Series Quadro FX 1400, 3400, 3450, 4400, 4500 VGA board layouts can change any time. Please check your board with the height restriction drawing to assure compatibility.  Rev.2: not compatible to 7800 series  Komaj zdaj sem opazil to ko majo v drobnem tisku navedeno. upam da ni prepozno

Niti ni tako pomebno da je kompaktibilno z grafo. Jaz sem mojo bivšo GF 7900 GT fural na NV Silencer 5 rev.3, s katerim ni kopaktibilna. Res pa je da sem moral dat en kos plastike na spodjo stran grafe da ni prišlo do kratkega stika.  LP  PS: Kupi gdo kuler?

Ni še prepozno !Sedaj čakam, če je kdo probal tlačit na grafo ta cooler, da pove če paše . Ker vsaj ko jih po videzu primerjam sta videti enake.  NV 5 rev. 3 ima dodatno en hladilnik iz spodnje strani (ki je namenjen GTX verziji) namreč GT na spodnji strani nima ramov.
